com.github.tadukoo.database.mysql.Database

Packages that use Database
Package
Description
com.github.tadukoo.database.mysql
Contains classes for working with a MySQL Database
com.github.tadukoo.database.mysql.pojo
Contains DatabasePojo, which can be used to store and retrieve the pojo values from a Database
